bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: I knew the person that was shot his name was James Finch I him after he was shot I heard the report of the shot the fellow that was witth me said what is that it's a shot we went over there Montgomery was with me saw the man lying on the floor Policeman was inquiring who he was told him I knew him He left Colefax together where I first enteres I saw the two firls now sitting here (identifies them) I asked who shot him, y brobably less than 3 minutes after the shot I got there Policeman was there when I got there, Next I se Policeman had hold of the prisoner and he was leading her back and forth inquiring for he that and one thing and another, I looked at the man and saw he wa wonded and Could hardly breath kinda excited me I did not take much notice to what was going on was watching him, Saw the Wound was on the next side of the neck near the collar bone

on turning round from looking on the man saw a Woman lying on the floor did not understand wheater she said when she Came up, dont remmeber what she said she wanted to see Man that was dying
Policeman left her up their by the store Kinda running her hands and think she said is he dead or is he dying going to die at that next I see her she back right up, and was lying on the floor supposed, to be fainting (Show Diagram) Body laid with his shoulder acros the threshold of the mines door Sae him after he was dead was with him when he died was the ame James Finch I was with before
Have known Jmaime about three months knew him first at Colefax the only name I knew by was Jamie
